TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TabSizeMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how tabs in a tab control are sized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode FillToRight = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The width of each tab is sized so that each row of tabs fills the entire width of the container control. This is only applicable to tab controls with more than one row.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode Fixed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: All tabs in a control are the same width.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode Normal = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The width of each tab is sized to accommodate what is displayed on the tab, and the size of tabs in a row are not adjusted to fill the entire width of the container control.
